description:
Authorize an org using an Salesforce Access Token
Authorize a Salesforce org using an access token.
file: path to a file containing the sfdx url
overwriteAuthFileYesNo:
An authorization file exists for user "%s". Are you sure you want to save the file?

Save the user (y/n)?
accessTokenFile: filepath to a text file that contains the access token
filesDoesNotExist: The given access token file, "%s", does not exist.
invalidAccessTokenFormat:
The given access token is not in the correct format
It should follow the patter %s.
